resources.string:
This COVID-19 app of ours mainly centralizes on the idea of pooling all the data into one cohesive platform, to help you track real-time information, do the correct trend analysis and make comparisons of different states of India and other countries. 

This mobile application will also include some awareness contents/ streamers to make the users realise to be more cautious and avoid the propagation of the virus 

Some features to be included in this app:

• Detailed dashboard screen 
• Current state and country wise data 
• Active search bar to search states/countries 
• Active voice search 
• Pie chart representation of the data 
• Visible country wise flags 
• Swipe to refresh 
• Enable light to dark mode
\u2022 Android Studio (4.0.1) \n\u2022 Android device or emulator \n\u2022 Technology: java, xml, json
